name: Facebook Morespace (fullscreen, for big screens)
description: More effective use of space on bigger screens (e.g. width 1600 pixel) while keeping the standard layout. More width for left and right side bar, bigger chat windows, and removing unneccessary elements. Customizable before installation. Not recommended for usage on small screens.
additional_info: Will be frequently updated when facebook changes its layout, because it is actively used by the developer. v1.0.3 (28.12.2016) - fix image sizes in chat bar v1.0.2 (06.03.2016) - fix image alignment for group chats in right sidebar, fix header width v1.0.1 (27.08.14) - classes updated for notification counts in left sidebar v1.0 (21.08.14) - first release
